details.description:
Gain 40 Power When Health above 90%
+10% Experience from Kills

description: Thesis: Double-click to set out a tome to share with anyone in the area. Stays active for 5 minutes.

Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Pollenated Ice Elemental Core
description:
Obtain an Ice Elemental Core from the remains of Shaman Lornarr Dragonseeker in the Snowblind fractal. Take it to a pollenated spore beneath one of the towers in the Silverwastes and imbue it.
This item only has value as part of a collection.
